title: Provoke Me
description: Book Two in the Unveiled series.Sometimes extreme provocation can lead to exactly what you need…Attracted. Kelly's focus is the bookstore she manages. Sex is relegated to a list of candidates on her PDA. Only one man pushes all her buttons―her boss.Fascinated. Spencer is determined to fight his desire for Kelly. For years they’ve bumped heads over the store they both love. But there's more than one reason their getting together is complicated.  Provoked. When Kelly and Spencer unexpectedly meet up at a sex club, all the rules go out the window. Suddenly there’s only way this match of wills can end―naked, preferably all night long. In this battle for sexual supremacy, there are two winners—and two losers when their stubbornness leads to the very thing each dreads most.Readers’ Advisory: In a couple of scenes, Kelly and Spencer test “the more the merrier” theory.
author: Cari Quinn
